block.p: Mia Haeyoung Rhee, the daughter of Dr. Chong Heon Rhee of Easton, Conn., and the late Youngsil Rhee, was married yesterday to Daniel Dae Hyun Kim, a son of Dr. and Mrs. Doo Tae Kim of Easton, Pa. The Rev. Louis Lunardini, an Episcopal minister, officiated at the First Presbyterian Church in Fairfield, Conn. The Rev. Ki Chun Lee, also an Episcopal minister, participated.

Mia Haeyoung Rhee, the daughter of Dr. Chong Heon Rhee of Easton, Conn., and the late Youngsil Rhee, was married yesterday to Daniel Dae Hyun Kim, a son of Dr. and Mrs. Doo Tae Kim of Easton, Pa. The Rev. Louis Lunardini, an Episcopal minister, officiated at the First Presbyterian Church in Fairfield, Conn. The Rev. Ki Chun Lee, also an Episcopal minister, participated.

Mrs. Kim, 27, is a graphic designer in Manhattan for Springer-Verlag New York Inc., a publisher of medical and science books. She graduated from Smith College. Her father is a pulmonary specialist at Bridgeport (Conn.) Hospital. Mr. Kim, 24, is an actor in New York. He graduated from Haverford College. His father is an anesthesiologist at Easton (Pa.) Hospital. WEDDINGS
